mapper.select: SELECT DS.BRDNO, DS.RENO, UF_DATETIME2STRING(DS.BRDDATE) BRDDATE, DS.TYPE AS extfield1 , TB.BRDTITLE FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT TB.BRDNO, TBL.BLNO RENO, TBL.BLDATE BRDDATE, TBL.USERNO, 'thumbs-o-up' as TYPE FROM TBL_BOARD TB LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_BOARDREAD TBR ON TBR.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND TBR.USERNO=#{userno} INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDLIKE TBL ON TBL.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND TB.USERNO=#{userno} AND TBL.BLDATE > CASE WHEN TB.BRDDATE>TBR.READDATE THEN TB.BRDDATE ELSE TBR.READDATE END UNION ALL SELECT ROW_NUMBER() AS RNUM, BRDNO, RENO, BRDDATE, USERNO , NVL2((SELECT TBRE.BRDNO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBRE WHERE TBRE.BRDNO=DS.BRDNO AND TBRE.USERNO=#{userno}), 'comments', 'files-o') TYPE FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BRDDATE DESC) AS RNUM ,TB.BRDNO, TBRE.RENO, TBRE.REDATE BRDDATE, TBRE.USERNO FROM TBL_BOARD TB LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_BOARDREAD TBR ON TBR.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND TBR.USERNO=#{userno} INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREPLY TBRE ON TBRE.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND TB.USERNO=#{userno} AND TBRE.USERNO!=#{userno} AND TBRE.REDATE > CASE WHEN TB.BRDDATE>TBR.READDATE THEN TB.BRDDATE ELSE TBR.READDATE END UNION SELECT TBR.BRDNO, TBRE.RENO, TBRE.REDATE BRDDATE, TBRE.USERNO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREAD TBRR ON TBR.BRDNO=TBRR.BRDNO INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREPLY TBRE ON TBRE.BRDNO=TBR.BRDNO WHERE TBR.REDELETEFLAG='N' AND TBR.USERNO=#{userno} AND TBRR.USERNO=#{userno} AND TBRE.USERNO!=#{userno} AND TBRE.REDATE > TBRR.READDATE ) DS WHERE RNUM <= 5 ) ) DS INNER JOIN TBL_BOARD TB ON DS.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO ORDER BY DS.BRDDATE DESC

SELECT DS.BRDNO, DS.RENO, TO_CHAR(DS.BRDDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') BRDDATE, DS.USERNO, DS.TYPE AS extfield1 , TB.BRDTITLE, TB.BRDLIKE, USERNM BRDWRITER , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREAD WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO) BRDHIT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT
FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT TB.BRDNO, TBL.BLNO RENO, TBL.BLDATE BRDDATE, TBL.USERNO, 'thumbs-o-up' as TYPE FROM TBL_BOARD TB LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_BOARDREAD TBR ON TBR.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND TBR.USERNO=#{userno} INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDLIKE TBL ON TBL.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND TB.USERNO=#{userno} AND TBL.BLDATE > CASE WHEN TB.BRDDATE>TBR.READDATE THEN TB.BRDDATE ELSE TBR.READDATE END UNION ALL SELECT BRDNO, RENO, BRDDATE, USERNO , NVL2((SELECT TBRE.BRDNO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBRE WHERE TBRE.BRDNO=DS.BRDNO AND TBRE.USERNO=#{userno}), 'comments', 'files-o') TYPE FROM ( SELECT TB.BRDNO, TBRE.RENO, TBRE.REDATE BRDDATE, TBRE.USERNO FROM TBL_BOARD TB LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_BOARDREAD TBR ON TBR.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND TBR.USERNO=#{userno} INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREPLY TBRE ON TBRE.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND TB.USERNO=#{userno} AND TBRE.USERNO!=#{userno} AND TBRE.REDATE > CASE WHEN TB.BRDDATE>TBR.READDATE THEN TB.BRDDATE ELSE TBR.READDATE END UNION SELECT TBR.BRDNO, TBRE.RENO, TBRE.REDATE BRDDATE, TBRE.USERNO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREAD TBRR ON TBR.BRDNO=TBRR.BRDNO INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREPLY TBRE ON TBRE.BRDNO=TBR.BRDNO WHERE TBR.REDELETEFLAG='N' AND TBR.USERNO=#{userno} AND TBRR.USERNO=#{userno} AND TBRE.USERNO!=#{userno} AND TBRE.REDATE > TBRR.READDATE ) DS ORDER BY BRDDATE DESC ) DS INNER JOIN TBL_BOARD TB ON DS.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_USER CU ON CU.USERNO=DS.USERNO ORDER BY DS.BRDDATE DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TB.BRDDATE DESC) AS RNUM , DS.BRDNO, TO_CHAR(DS.BRDDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') BRDDATE, DS.TYPE extfield1 , TB.BRDTITLE, BGNAME, USERNM BRDWRITER , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREAD WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO) BRDHIT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT FROM ( SELECT TB.BRDNO, BRDDATE, 'files-o' as TYPE FROM TBL_BOARD TB WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND TB.USERNO=#{searchExt1} UNION ALL SELECT TBR.BRDNO, TBR.REDATE BRDDATE, 'comments' as TYPE FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR WHERE TBR.REDELETEFLAG='N' AND TBR.USERNO=#{searchExt1} ORDER BY BRDDATE DESC ) DS INNER JOIN TBL_BOARD TB ON DS.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDGROUP TBG ON TBG.BGNO=TB.BGNO LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_USER CU ON CU.USERNO=TB.USERNO )
WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${rowStart} AND ${rowStart-1}+${displayRowCount} -- OFFSET ${rowStart-1} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${displayRowCount} ROWS ONLY -- oracle12c
SELECT CODECD, CODENM FROM COM_CODE WHERE CLASSNO=#{classno} -- AND DELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY CAST(CODECD AS INT)
